item.title: Lenovo ThinkCentre M75q Gen 2
item.description: Specs Processor: AMD Ryzen™ 5 PRO 4650GE 3.3GHz 6C/12T1 Video Card: AMD Renoir Memory: 8GB DDR4 3200 Storage Drive: 128GB SSD M.2 2242 NVMe TLC Wireless: Intel AX200 2x2ax+BT WW Upgrades Upgraded System RAM from 8GB to 32GB. Installed TEAMGROUP T-Force Zeus DDR4 32GB (2x16GB) 3200MHz CL16 Installed Seagate BarraCuda 5TB 2.5" Internal HDD, mounted on /home. 128G SSD installed with Debian 12. Linux System operates fine as a Linux server.

item.title: Dell Precision 5540 Mobile Workstation
item.description: Specs Processor: Intel® Core™ Processor i7-9750H, 6C/12T, 12M Cache, 2.60GHz up to 4.5GHz Turbo, 45W Coffee Lake Operating System: Windows 10 Pro (64bit) Eng - Windows 11 Supported Video Card: NVIDIA Quadro T1000 w/4GB GDDR5 Display: 15.6”, UHD 4K (3840 x 2160), IGZO, Touch, 100% Adobe color gamut Memory: 16GB, 1x16GB, DDR4 2666MHz Non-ECC Memory Storage Drive: M.2 512GB PCIe NVMe Class 40 SSD Keyboard: Internal US English Backlit Keyboard Wireless: Intel Dual Band Wireless AC 9260 802.

item.title: Dell Precision M3800 Workstation
item.description: Dell’s Precision M3800 is an ultrabook-shaped mobile workstation, combining powerful components with a slim chassis. I’ve owned this laptop for a number of years now, I rebuilt this unit after being given it by a friend who purchased a newer laptop after a mainboard & internal battery failure. I replaced the motherboard & battery; roughly $300nzd / $180usd is what it cost me, additionally I purchased a sata adapter cable since this didn’t come with one included.

item.title: About
item.description: Written in Go, Hugo is an open source static site generator available under the Apache Licence 2.0. Hugo supports TOML, YAML and JSON data file types, Markdown and HTML content files and uses shortcodes to add rich content. Other notable features are taxonomies, multilingual mode, image processing, custom output formats, HTML/CSS/JS minification and support for Sass SCSS workflows. Hugo makes use of a variety of open source projects including: https://github.com/yuin/goldmark https://github.
